sentences.cn: 英国王室拒绝发表评论。

sentences.en: Everyone must be familiar with the old favourite among roses, Crystal Palace.
sentences.cn: 大家一定都很熟悉玫瑰中的老牌名品“水晶宫殿”。

sentences.en: He recounted how heavily armed soldiers forced him from the presidential palace.
sentences.cn: 他讲述了自己是怎样被全副武装的士兵从总统官邸里赶出来的。

sentences.en: He was transferred from Crystal Palace to Arsenal for £2.5 million.
sentences.cn: 他以250万英镑的身价从水晶宫队转入阿森纳队。

sentences.en: Last night he attended a state banquet at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他出席了在白金汉宫举行的国宴。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, back in London, Palace Pictures was collapsing.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，伦敦的皇宫影业公司也正在分崩离析。

sentences.en: Mist shrouded the outline of Buckingham Palace.
sentences.cn: 雾霭蒙蒙，白金汉宫若隐若现。

sentences.en: The palace has extensive gardens, a maze, and tennis courts.
sentences.cn: 这座宫殿有几座大花园、一处迷宫和几个网球场。

sentences.en: The palace is a complete hotch-potch of architectural styles.
sentences.cn: 这座宫殿完全是各种建筑风格的大杂烩。
该宫殿从周一至周日均对外开放。

sentences.en: The Palace last night refused to comment on the reports.
sentences.cn: 昨晚王室拒绝对报道作出评论。

sentences.en: The palace was bedecked with flags.
the regal splendour of the palace
You can visit the whole palace except for the private apartments.
sentences.cn: 整座宫殿除内殿外均可参观。

trans.tran_cn: 宫殿，王室，豪宅，大的公共建筑
trans.tran_en: the official home of a person of very high rank, especially a king or queen – often used in names
